attributes.action: Make the BB & TV License Optional
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the BBC Channels and the TV License should be optional to Sky Subscribers.

It is appalling that the population is forced to pay for a TV License when they would quite happily go without the BBC.

Even BLIND people only get a 50% discount for the Television License. If you own a mobile phone, you are basically required to own a TV License now.

"This includes a TV set, digital box, video or DVD recorder, computer, laptop or mobile phone." -- Quoted from the TV License website.

People should have the option of removing the BBC Content from their Sky Subscriptions, and not have to pay the TV License.
